doc.title: The Industry
doc.plot: In this scripted documentary (mockumentary) we follow Chad, an arrogant college student, as he pursues getting into the glamorous life of being a professional Adult Entertainer. Life will be all about money, hot girls and sex, but when Chad shows up to his first shoot, he quickly learns that this industry isn't exactly what he had in mind. This film is based on true stories and real interviews.
